subdisciplines.name: Poetry Analysis
subdisciplines.description: The study of poetry and its different elements, such as form, structure, language, and meaning.

subdisciplines.name: Poetry Criticism
subdisciplines.description: The evaluation and interpretation of poetry with a focus on the quality and artistic merit of the work.

subdisciplines.name: Poetry Performance
subdisciplines.description: The art of delivering poetry through public speaking, acting, or other forms of performance.

subdisciplines.name: Poetic Forms
subdisciplines.description: The study and practice of different poetic forms, such as sonnet, haiku, villanelle, and free verse.

subdisciplines.name: Poetry Writing Techniques
subdisciplines.description: The study and practice of different techniques used in writing poetry, such as imagery, metaphor, rhyme, and meter.
